courses.name: Individual Study: Financial Engineering
courses.desc: A student may work with an individual faculty member on a topic of mutual interest.  These studies are co-designed by the student and the faculty member based on:  1) learning objectives  2)  means of achieving these objectives  3) method of evaluation.
